title: Aw hmangaihna ka sawi thiam lo
lyrics:
Aw, hmangaihna ka sawi thiam lo
Na, ka ngawi thei lo;
Lei leh van Lalpa, ropui leh thianghlim mawizia,
Haleluia, thiam tawk tal hian, aw, i thlir ang u.

Thianghlim, Thianghlim, Thianghlim,
Thianghlim Lalbera chu;
Thianghlim, Thianghlim, Thianghlim,
Min chhandamtu a ni.

Aw, hmangaihna ka sawi seng lo,
Aw, a zau mang e;
Khawvel thimna leh lungngaihna chhum zing mah se,
A dal chuang lo hremhmun pawhin, aw, a eng mang e.

Haleluia! Haleluia!
Aw, a eng mang e;
Zion var chungah thianghlima hla mawi an sa,
A fak hla chu tuipui fawn ang hian a bang thei lo.
